snippet.title: Love, Ghostie - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Love, Ghostie is a dating sim game where you are a wholesome ghost matchmaker and you grow relationships between the manor’s residents! Gift items to lift their spirits, set them up on dates, and watch love bloom! Discover cute romances with a unique story between every pair of residents! How will love blossom in your manor?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1789490/Love_Ghostie/?utm_source=youtube
Website: https://www.janbehgames.com/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@janbehchanbeh
Twitter: https://twitter.com/janbehchanbeh
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/janbehchanbeh/

#indiegames #gaming #cozygames
